worktree_state.content:
{
  "sourceType": "ideation",
  "ideationType": "documentation_gaps",
  "ideaId": "doc-003",
  "rationale": "Frontend development requires understanding component APIs, prop types, and hook behavior. Currently developers must read implementation to understand how to use components like FlowDesigner, AgentExecutionModal, or TaskExecutionModal.",
  "category": "documentation",
  "priority": "medium"
}

task_intent.title: Document Frontend React Components and Hooks
task_intent.description: Add comprehensive JSDoc documentation to all React components and custom hooks in the frontend, including prop types, usage examples, component purposes, state management, and side effects.
